reuters.title: ITEL <ITEL> BUYS CASTLE/COOKE <CKE> UNIT ASSETS
reuters.body: Itel Corp said it has completed the previously-announced acquisition of the container fleet and related assets of Castle and Cooke Inc's Flexi-Van Leasing Inc subsidiary for about 130 mln dlrs in cash and marketable securities, 30 mln dlrs in notes, three mln common shares and the assumption of liabilities. The company said it has obtained 150 mln dlrs in financing from a bank group for the deal, and the common shares are subject to a 10-year restriction on their sale and voting. Reuter 
